mapper.sql: emp_id, emp_name, emp_idcard, emp_name_simple, emp_phone, emp_political_status, emp_sex, emp_marital_status, nation_name, emp_Email, emp_hobby, emp_province, emp_city, emp_county, emp_address, emp_contact_name, emp_contact_phone, emp_contact_relationship, emp_contact_address, emp_Employment_nature, emp_photo_path, emp_Entry_date, emp_tryout_end_date, emp_now_status, emp_technical_title_name, emp_grade_id, emp_registrant, emp_salary_cardnumber, emp_medical_insurance_cardnumber, emp_endowment_insurance_cardnumber, emp_idcard_front, emp_idcard_reverse, emp_Degree_certificate, emp_Education_certificate, emp_technical_title_path, emp_Education_experience, emp_work_experience, emp_train_experience, emp_society_relation, emp_remarks, emp_delectStatus, emp_department, emp_position, emp_educational_background, emp_age, emp_birthday, emp_origin_detail, emp_now_province, emp_now_city, emp_now_county, emp_now_detail, emp_contact_address_province, emp_contact_address_city, emp_contact_address_county, emp_contact_address_detail, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id,e.emp_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee AS e INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_user AS u ON u.emp_id=e.emp_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position AS p ON p.position_id=u.position_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_department AS d ON d.depart_id=p.department_id WHERE d.depart_id=#{deptid}

SELECT oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id AS emp_id, emp_name, oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department, depart_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee LEFT JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id
oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = #{emp_department}

SELECT oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id AS emp_id, emp_name, oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position AS emp_position, position_name, oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department, depart_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee LEFT JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id LEFT JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_contract ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id = oa_rlzyb_contract.emp_id
oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id = #{emp_id}

SELECT emp_id,emp_name,emp_department,depart_name,emp_position,position_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id where emp_name like concat("%",#{emp_name},"%")

SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_department, depart_name, emp_position, position_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id where emp_now_status = "在职" and emp_delectStatus = "未删除"
and emp_department = #{emp_department,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position,position_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id
where emp_id = #{emp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id AS emp_id, emp_name, oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position AS emp_position, position_name, oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department, depart_name FROM oa_rlzyb_employee LEFT JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id LEFT JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id
oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id = #{emp_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM oa_rlzyb_employee WHERE emp_name IS null
mapper.select: select count(1) from oa_rlzyb_employee where emp_Email = #{emp_Email} and emp_delectStatus = '未删除'
select count(1) from oa_rlzyb_employee where emp_phone = #{emp_phone} and emp_delectStatus = '未删除'

select
,d.depart_name AS emp_department_name ,p.position_name AS emp_position_name FROM tyyhoa.oa_rlzyb_employee e left JOIN tyyhoa.oa_rlzyb_department d ON e.emp_department = d.depart_id left JOIN tyyhoa.oa_rlzyb_position p ON e.emp_position = p.position_id where emp_department = ${DepartId} and emp_delectStatus = '未删除' and emp_now_status = '在职';
select count(1) from tyyhoa.oa_rlzyb_employee where emp_idcard = #{emp_idcard} and emp_delectStatus = '未删除'
SELECT emp_id FROM tyyhoa.oa_rlzyb_employee where emp_idcard = #{emp_idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emp_delectStatus = '未删除'

where emp_id =#{emp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
